Description: Open-work glazed composition amulet in the form of a wedjat-eye; black brow and pupil; damage to the lower vertical.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2003 17 Jul-12 Oct, Valencia, Instituto Valenciano de Arte Moderno, The Eyesight and the Vision
Condition: fair - damage to the lower vertical
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Walter L Lawson
